contentencoded: One of the Little Rock Nine, the group of black students that desegregated public high schools in Arkansas in 1957, died this week. Today we mark the passing of Jefferson Thomas by looking at that moment in America’s Civil Rights history.
description: One of the Little Rock Nine, the group of black students that desegregated public high schools in Arkansas in 1957, […]
title: The Little Rock Nine
teaser: One of the Little Rock Nine, the group of black students that desegregated public high schools in Arkansas in 1957, […]
